channel.title: Posts on Sous Chefs
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Sous Chefs

item.title: board nominations
item.description: Vote We’ve reached the time of year to vote in another set of board members. What we’re looking for This year we’re pushing for a more diverse crowd of maintainers and advocates. If you can help fill this stop please apply! What’s in it for me? Fame, glory, riches. Are not included, but you will get to shape the direction of Sous-Chefs. Read membership for more information about what the board does.
